task_description:
# Unit Test Foundation

Establish automated testing infrastructure with Vitest, React Testing Library, and initial test coverage for critical components and business logic.

## Rationale
Currently there is no test coverage (identified as technical debt). As features grow, lack of tests increases bug risk and slows development. Starting with critical paths establishes testing culture early.

## User Stories
- As a developer, I want automated tests so I can refactor with confidence
- As a maintainer, I want CI tests so bugs are caught before deployment
- As a contributor, I want test examples so I know how to test new features

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Vitest and React Testing Library configured in project
- [ ] Test scripts added to package.json
- [ ] Unit tests for XP calculation and rank progression logic
- [ ] Component tests for critical UI components (ProfileCard, EventCard)
- [ ] Integration tests for Supabase authentication flow
- [ ] CI pipeline runs tests on pull requests
- [ ] Code coverage reporting enabled
